page.title: 07The Houses in our Area
page.content: The Houses in our area are made from a wooden frame, red brick on the out side then coated with white plaster.There have been six houses built already ananother four still to be built.By the market there are only seven houses and they have all been built of sandstone. At Burnbrae there are eight houses.Seven of them are built from sandstone and one is built from red brick and white plaster and smoothed with a screeder,which is a sort of trowel,but it's made from wood.At Gatelawdridge there are eleven houses and they are all built from sandstone. One of these is a huge house which has been split into several smaller houses and flats.There are eight houses at Cample.In each of these is a telephone kiosk and a pillar box.
